chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Hypotheses:
V: world
U: world
K: hooks
w: injects U V K
s: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM Label dstatelet)
s2: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM Label dstatelet)
s1: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM Label dstatelet)
this: nid

Goal:
s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)

Premises:
hooks = union_map hook_domain hook_type : Type
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x : ?T, ?a x} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [U : world V : world K : hooks w : injects U V K s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet this : nid |- eqType] ?a : [U : world V : world K : hooks w : injects U V K s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet this : nid |- pred ?T] ?s : [U : world V : world K : hooks w : injects U V K s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet this : nid |- seq ?T]
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
cohK : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K), V = U \+ inj_ext w \+ (Unit, K)
step_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
a_step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
stepV1 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s1
step_preserves_labels : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom s1 =i dom s2
stepV2 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s2
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.send_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> forall (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1) (s2 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Actions.a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
inj_ext : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world
E : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world
prodPCM = fun U V : pcm => PCM.Pack (prodPCMMixin U V) : pcm -> pcm -> pcm
Actions.a_step : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state), Actions.a_safe a s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom_join : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> DepMaps.DepMaps.Label) (um1 um2 : union_map DepMaps.DepMaps.Label V), DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom labF um1 -> DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom labF um2 -> DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom labF (um1 \+ um2)
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Actions.a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom : forall V : Type, (V -> DepMaps.DepMaps.Label) -> union_map DepMaps.DepMaps.Label V -> bool
dom_prec : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 g1 g2 : U), valid (f1 \+ g1) -> f1 \+ g1 = f2 \+ g2 -> dom f1 =i dom f2 -> f1 = f2
um_pts : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), K -> V -> union_mapUMC K V
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)

```coq
intros.
intros H1 H2 H3.
destruct H3 as [H4 H5].
destruct H4 as [H6 H7 H8 H9 H10].
split.
- split.
  + assumption.
  + split.
    * assumption.
    * split.
      ++ assumption.
      ++ intros l0.
         specialize (H10 l0).
         eapply H10.
         * assumption.
         * apply H1.
- apply SendMsg; try assumption.
  eapply SendMsg; eauto.
Qed.
```
